article: the convergence council of the second economic community of west african states -lrb- ecowas -rrb- monetary zone thursday had a one-day meeting in nigeria 's capital abuja to discuss developments on the creation of the second monetary zone and a single currency for the sub-region .
abstract: ecowas ministers meet over second monetary zone
